vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.withdraw (patch_6.sol#16-23) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(calculatedFibNumber * 1000000000000000000) (patch_6.sol#22)

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.withdraw (patch_6.sol#16-23) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	success = fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(fibSig,withdrawalCounter) (patch_6.sol#19)

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.fallback (patch_6.sol#25-28) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	success = fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(msg.data) (patch_6.sol#26)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.calculatedFibNumber (patch_6.sol#6) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- withdraw (patch_6.sol#16-23)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function setFibonacci(uint n) public {
        calculatedFibNumber = fibonacci(n);

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in FibonacciBalance.withdraw (patch_6.sol#16-23):
	-success = fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(fibSig,withdrawalCounter) patch_6.sol#19

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in FibonacciBalance.fallback (patch_6.sol#25-28):
	-success = fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(msg.data) patch_6.sol#26

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_fibonacciLibrary' of FibonacciBalance. (patch_6.sol#12) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_start' of FibonacciLib.setStart (patch_6.sol#35) is not in mixedCase
